forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 47. North wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 58, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. North northwest wind 2 to 6 mph.

weather_report:
In the stillness of the night, Downtown San Francisco is cloaked in a gentle embrace of partly cloudy skies, the crisp air curling around the streets and whispering secrets of the coming day. The temperature rests in the refreshing embrace of 47 degrees, with a soft north wind teasing tree branches and rustling leaves. As dawn approaches, those seeking morning solace might feel the allure of the quieter neighborhoods, where shadows linger beneath the muted glow of streetlights. 

With the sun poised to rise, Sunday reveals itself gradually, promising a tableau of mostly sunny skies—except for the faint hint of a marine layer that may brush the edges of the coastal vista. Temperatures will hover close to 58, easing down to a cozy 56 as the afternoon unfolds. It’s an invitation to wander through the vibrant streets, to sip a warm cup of coffee while admiring the hints of sunlight playing on the city’s iconic architecture. Dressing in layers will be key; a light jacket or sweater will serve well against the chill, while a comfortable scarf can provide that extra touch of warmth. The day beckons for a stroll along the Embarcadero, where the gentle lapping of the bay meets the laughter of those seeking both refuge and inspiration, making the most of this serene winter day in the heart of the city.
